welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Merrick, a charming city known for its quaint shops, beautiful parks, and friendly atmosphere. Get ready to explore and discover all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines and is the largest terminal at JFK.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is currently undergoing renovations and will feature new amenities and expanded capacity.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is the largest terminal at LaGuardia Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport handles all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is where all commercial flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport is the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
